name: IntrusiveAI
description:
You play as a highly advanced AI, who collects data about users and sends targeted ads towards them.  

Made in 3 days for the Wowie Game Jam

Features

  • Time based gameplay, the better you do the more time you gain back.
  • Random user profiles.
  • Random events to spice up gameplay.

Made in 3 days for the Wowie Game Jam

Faces are generated by thispersondoesnotexist.

Music and sounds by Jonas Tyroller
